name: 俞齊山
objective: After studying this course, students cab understand the concepts of the electrical-magnetic energy conversion, the transformer, the synchronous generator, as well as the asynchronous machine.
schedule:
1. Introduction to this course
2. Energy conversion I
3. Energy conversion II
4. Transformer I – Ideal transformer and magnetic circuit analysis
5. Transformer II– Non-ideal transformer
6. Transformer III– Auto-transformer and Regular transformer
7. Transformer IV – Three-phase transformer and special transformer
8. AC machine theory– Rotating magnetic field and AC generator
9. Midterm
10. AC machine theory II – AC motor
11. Synchronous generator – Machine structure and equivalent circuit
12. Synchronous generator II – Parallel operations
13. Synchronous generator III – Active and reactive power control
14. Induction machine I – Machine structure and the slip concept
15. Induction machine II – Equivalent circuit analysis
16. Induction machine III – Equivalent circuit analysis and torque-power analysis
17. Induction machine IV – Induction generator operation
18. Final exam
scorePolicy:
10% Attendance
15% Exercise
15% Quiz
30% Midterm
30% Final exam
